name: House Sitter
description:
A vengeful ghost haunts the house, and it's up to you to outsmart it and complete your chores. As nights pass, you'll uncover the haunting story of the ghost and the events that led to its wrath. Each night presents new challenges as the ghost becomes more aggressive and relentless in its pursuit. Can you survive the 5 nights and complete your chores?

INVESTIGATE THE HOUSE'S SECRETS


Every day Dale, the homeowner, leaves you a message on the phone. But he seems to be keeping something from you... Find VHS tapes around the house to uncover what truly happened in that house. That is... if you have time!

COMPLETE YOUR CHORES


Randomized chores that increase in difficulty. Beware not getting them done by 6 AM...

FIX APPLIANCES OR ELSE!



Chores aren't the only thing you have to worry about! A broken breaker can suddenly and randomly go off. Is it hot in here? You best believe you aren't the only entity bothered by the broken furnace.

CAN YOU COLLECT THEM ALL?

Competitively earn achievements for surviving every night and finding and playing the tapes. It won't be easy!
